name: Tsukimi Tower Defense
description:
Controls:

  • M to mute music
  • R to reload level
  • U to update hovered tower
  • P to start/pause
  • Right click to cancel tower placement
  • Left

What is it:

Tower defense game made for Touhou Game Jam 5! Fight food-turned-youkai that was rejected by the moon during the Tsukimi Festival.

There's two levels, the first being like 5 seconds long but the second being pretty full of enemies n stuff.

If you're having trouble with the 2nd level, my best advice is to try to get a strong start...

I might come back to this some day bc I had a lot of tower ideas... making tower defense games is fun... but hard... that's my takeaway from this game jam... ~_~
